page.title: 08The population of the area
page.content: The poulation of the area is small and each of the 4 villages have a mixture of age and social class.Alverton is the smallest with 20 residents, Flawborough has approx.40.Shelton has between 50 and 100 and Thoroton about the same.There is sprinkling of children in each village who are educated outside the area.There are also retired people in the villages although many of them part-time work to supplement their pensions.The working population is equally split between those who work in the area mainly in farming and those who commute to work in professions in the town.The pop. is more floating than it used to be as locally based industry is negligable therefore the passing need for tied farm cottages no longer applicable these properties are being made available for commuting workers.
